name: ROVICORE™ FR 450/D3/450
description: ROVICORE™ FR 450/D3/450 is a reinforcement comprising a non-woven synthetic 180gsm core and two 450glass mats stitched one on each side of the core.The special ROVICORE™ FR core, combined with suitable resins, provides fire-resistant properties for use in sectors such as construction and transport.
